NewsArticle.Title: Skill & Spell Leveling Bonus Event
NewsArticle.Content: Skill & Spell Leveling Bonus Starting June 18th, all registered characters will receive DOUBLE the leveling rate of Skills and Spells. Using the leveling bonus item from the itemshop will QUADRUPLE the rate!!! ((This event will begin on June 18th and END on June 23rd 3PM PST. Register your accounts to take advantage of this special event!))
